echo linux system:
1.command - 
npm run posix-clean
Description: clean dist folder or removed it.

2.command - 
npm run posix-prod-build
Description: build typescript to js in dis folder, copy .env, index.js, package.josn, view folder, assests folder.

3.command - 
npm run posix-production
Description:runs in superuser permission 'sudo' with pm2 app.ts node code, index.js for angular prod build code serve.

4.command - 
npm run posix-stop
Description:it will stop super user process that started with superuser pm2


 WINDOWS Instructions:
**********NOTE**********
ALl descriprtions are same as posix command Description

2.command -

3.command -

scripts.posix-prod-build: tsc app.ts --outDir dist && cp .env dist/.env && cp index.js dist/index.js && cp package.json dist/package.json && cp -r view dist/view && cp -r assets dist/assets && cp -r cert dist/cert
scripts.posix-production: cd dist && echo Starting Server with node production && sudo  pm2 start index.js && sudo pm2 start app.js
scripts.posix-stop: sudo pm2 kill && sudo pm2 status
scripts.win32-prod-build: tsc app.ts --outDir dist && cp .env dist/.env && cp index.js dist/index.js && cp package.json dist/package.json && cp -r view dist/view && cp -r assets dist/assets && cp -r cert dist/cert
scripts.win32-production: cd dist && echo Starting Server with node production && pm2 start index.js && pm2 start app.js
